titleStmt.title: An act for the better enabling the executors of Thomas Lloyd Esq., deceased, for selling of land for the payment of debts and portions settled by the said Thomas Lloyd and Patience his wife upon her children by her former husband Robert Story, deceased
titleStmt.author: New York (State)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Bradford, printer to the King's Excellent Majesty, at the Bible in New-York,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: The fifth Assembly, third sessions, begining the 25th day of March and ending the 24th day of April, anno regni Regis Gulilemi nunc Angliae, Scotiae, Franciae & Hiberniae sexto.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
